metadata.name: TSTW: PROMO ONE
metadata.description:
In a world without electricity, barbarianism and corruption reign. As our protagonist, Unit, attempts to stay true to the laws that his father, an Artificial Intelligence, put in place, a myriad of dark forces work to corrupt him. Can he restore electricity and bring order back into the world, and if so, at what cost?

-

This an official promo NFT celebrating the completion of book one of 'The Space Time War' trilogy.

Discover more thespacetimewar.com.
